name: Release 1.13.0b1
body:
## What's Changed
* Updated readme to include unicode chars by @gavin-aguiar in https://github.com/Azure/azure-functions-python-library/pull/144
* Fixing the Key decode issue for multi-events  by @shrohilla in https://github.com/Azure/azure-functions-python-library/pull/146
* Revert "Revert "Add SQL Binding support (#124)"" by @gavin-aguiar in https://github.com/Azure/azure-functions-python-library/pull/147

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Azure/azure-functions-python-library/compare/1.12.0...1.13.0b1

name: Release 1.12.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Revert "Update __init__.py" by @gavin-aguiar in https://github.com/Azure/azure-functions-python-library/pull/140
* Removed tests dir from wheel package by @gavin-aguiar in https://github.com/Azure/azure-functions-python-library/pull/141
* Async handle adaptor by @tonybaloney in https://github.com/Azure/azure-functions-python-library/pull/143


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Azure/azure-functions-python-library/compare/1.11.3...1.12.0

name: Release 1.11.3 (abandoned)
body:
## What's Changed
* Add SQL Binding support  by @gavin-aguiar in https://github.com/Azure/azure-functions-python-library/pull/127
* added decorators for Table storage. by @pdthummar in https://github.com/Azure/azure-functions-python-library/pull/123
* Adding Microsoft SECURITY.MD by @microsoft-github-policy-service in https://github.com/Azure/azure-functions-python-library/pull/134
* Increase http test code coverage. by @pdthummar in https://github.com/Azure/azure-functions-python-library/pull/128
* Increase eventhub and cosmosdb test code coverage to above 90%. by @pdthummar in https://github.com/Azure/azure-functions-python-library/pull/133
* Increase queue test code coverage to above 90% by @pdthummar in https://github.com/Azure/azure-functions-python-library/pull/132
* Blueprint interfaces implementation by @YunchuWang in https://github.com/Azure/azure-functions-python-library/pull/116
* Increase kafka, servicebus and durable-functions test code coverage. by @pdthummar in https://github.com/Azure/azure-functions-python-library/pull/136
* Performance tweaks for to_camel_case by @pamelafox in https://github.com/Azure/azure-functions-python-library/pull/131
* Optimize functions decorator by @tonybaloney in https://github.com/Azure/azure-functions-python-library/pull/129
* labelling http function type pystein by @YunchuWang in https://github.com/Azure/azure-functions-python-library/pull/137
* Binding name updates by @gavin-aguiar in https://github.com/Azure/azure-functions-python-library/pull/139
* log warning for function app without http functions by @YunchuWang in https://github.com/Azure/azure-functions-python-library/pull/138

## New Contributors
* @microsoft-github-policy-service made their first contribution in https://github.com/Azure/azure-functions-python-library/pull/134
* @pamelafox made their first contribution in https://github.com/Azure/azure-functions-python-library/pull/131

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Azure/azure-functions-python-library/compare/1.11.2...1.11.3

name: Release 1.11.1
body:
## What's Changed
* replace abstractclassmethod with abstract/class method by @YunchuWang in https://github.com/Azure/azure-functions-python-library/pull/121
* Add SQL Binding support by @Charles-Gagnon in https://github.com/Azure/azure-functions-python-library/pull/124
* GH#107: Skip setting multi Set-Cookie headers for python 3.7 by @YunchuWang in https://github.com/Azure/azure-functions-python-library/pull/125
* added decorators for EventGrid. by @pdthummar in https://github.com/Azure/azure-functions-python-library/pull/122

## New Contributors
* @Charles-Gagnon made their first contribution in https://github.com/Azure/azure-functions-python-library/pull/124

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Azure/azure-functions-python-library/compare/1.11.0...1.11.1

name: Release 1.11.0
body:
## Highlights
- Adding missing timer objects (#110)
- Add generic binding decorators (#108)

## What's Changed
* Add missing fields in the timer object. by @pdthummar in https://github.com/Azure/azure-functions-python-library/pull/110
* remove internal cosmos DB keys filtering by @YunchuWang in https://github.com/Azure/azure-functions-python-library/pull/119
* Address PySpec feedback for the new programming model by @YunchuWang in https://github.com/Azure/azure-functions-python-library/pull/112
* Add generic binding decorators/Modify existing decorators to enable decorator extensibility under the new programming model by @YunchuWang in https://github.com/Azure/azure-functions-python-library/pull/108
* Fix for GH#107: Enable support for multiple Set-Cookie response headers (native & WSGI/ASGI) by @YunchuWang in https://github.com/Azure/azure-functions-python-library/pull/115
* Refactored tests for decorators by @pdthummar in https://github.com/Azure/azure-functions-python-library/pull/117

## New Contributors
* @pdthummar made their first contribution in https://github.com/Azure/azure-functions-python-library/pull/110

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Azure/azure-functions-python-library/compare/1.10.1...1.11.0

name: Release 1.10.1
body:
# Highlights
- Enabling New Programming Model (#99, #105)

## What's Changed (Detailed)
* Correcting codecov check for Python by @vrdmr in https://github.com/Azure/azure-functions-python-library/pull/104
* New programming model lib change by @YunchuWang in https://github.com/Azure/azure-functions-python-library/pull/99
* Add type hints to `HttpResponse` by @michelole in https://github.com/Azure/azure-functions-python-library/pull/94
* WSGI middleware should unquote path_info  by @mcuckson in https://github.com/Azure/azure-functions-python-library/pull/89
* Fixing the mypy failures and fixing CI workflow by @vrdmr in https://github.com/Azure/azure-functions-python-library/pull/106
* ASGI worker: Yield a `http.disconnect` on any additional receive calls by @tonybaloney in https://github.com/Azure/azure-functions-python-library/pull/98
* Added decorator for storage blobs by @gavin-aguiar in https://github.com/Azure/azure-functions-python-library/pull/105

## New Contributors
* @YunchuWang made their first contribution in https://github.com/Azure/azure-functions-python-library/pull/99
* @michelole made their first contribution in https://github.com/Azure/azure-functions-python-library/pull/94
* @mcuckson made their first contribution in https://github.com/Azure/azure-functions-python-library/pull/89

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Azure/azure-functions-python-library/compare/1.9.0...1.10.0

- Adding Kafka Headers to Bindings #100
- Exclude azure from package build #97

name: Release 1.8.0
body:
- Added trace and retry context properties
- Add missing date/time formats for Servicebus

name: Release 1.7.2
body: - Fix a module registration issue where the azure.functions._thirdparty is not recognized as a submodule of azure.functions

name: Release 1.7.1
body: - Implements an ASGI middleware wrapper compatible with ASGI 2.1 (https://github.com/Azure/azure-functions-python-library/pull/86)

name: Release 1.7.0
body:
- Exposed Python Worker Extension Interfaces for third-party libraries to integrate into Azure Functions Python Worker.
  - Third-party library vendors can now implement the abstract classes FuncExtensionBase (apply to specific trigger) and AppExtensionBase (apply to all triggers in function app) to allow Python Worker execute your lifecycle hooks.
  - Lifecycle hooks that is supported in AppExtensionBase: post_function_load_app_level, pre_invocation_app_level, post_invocation_app_level
  - Lifecycle hooks that is supported in FuncExtensionBasse: post_function_load, pre_invocation, post_invocation

name: Release 1.6.0
body: - Exposing properties and metadata fields for blobs (#77)

name: Release 1.5.0
body:
In this release:
- Added support to ServiceBusTrigger batch processing when cardinality is set to many in function.json (https://github.com/Azure/azure-functions-python-library/issues/66)

name: Release 1.4.0
body:
In this release:
* Added support for Entity Trigger (#68)

name: Release 1.3.1
body:
In this release

1. Fix an issue where EnqueuedTimeUtc is returning None in EventHub trigger. (https://github.com/Azure/azure-functions-python-library/pull/65)
2. Fix an issue where Blob trigger throws an exception when the blob does not exist in storage account. Will return None instead. (https://github.com/Azure/azure-functions-python-library/pull/67)

name: Release 1.3.0
body:
In this release

1. Add support for Kafka extension with **KafkaEvent**, **KafkaConverter**, **KafkaTriggerConverter**. (#62)
2. Add metadata field in ServiceBus and EventHub
    - This feature is not available yet: the python_value and python_type is not yet enabled on the worker side

name: Release 1.2.1
body:
In this release
1. Added EventGrid output binding definition. (#56)
2. Fixing activity triggers in durable functions (#53, #57)

name: Release 1.2.0
body:
In this release:
1. Add supports for Python durable functions
    - Introduce `func.OrchestrationContext` in function orchestration trigger definition
(e.g. `def main(context: func.OrchestrationContext):`)
    - Accepts `orchestrationTrigger` and `activityTrigger` as rich bindings in **function.json**
2. Fix an issue where the built-in **azure.functions** library is not loaded correctly on load function request

name: Release 1.1.0
body:
In this release:

1. Add support for WSGI web framework
2. Fix a bug where iothub event metadata are missing from the trigger context
3. Fix an issue when setting eventhub cardinality to many, does not match the function context

name: Release 1.0.8
body:
In this release:
1. Add Python 3.8 support
2. Fix EventGrid local time parsing (https://github.com/Azure/azure-functions-python-worker/issues/591)

name: Release 1.0.7
body:
In this release:

1. Allow Python 3.7 to use enumerable function param annotations

name: Release 1.0.6
body:
In this release:

1. Allow EventHub function param annotation to be set to **List[func.EventHubEvent]**
    - This provides a much cleaner function signature `def main(events: List[func.EventHubEvent]):` when **cardinality=many** is set and it is used for processing multiple EventHub events.

name: Release 1.0.5
body:
In this release:

1. Allow ComosDB to handle null id parameter
2. Allow parsing of additional datetime formats

name: Release 1.0.4
body:
In this release:

1. `delivery_count` property added for Service Bus Trigger

name: Release 1.0.3
body:
In this release:

1. Handle EventHub cardinality setting

name: Release 1.0.0b1
body: The `HttpRequest` class now exposes the `route_params` property.
